msg.msgText:
A "TopicMonitor" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create TopicMonitor help imaserver create TopicMonitor "TopicString=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver create TopicMonitor "TopicString=topic1/#"
Configuration items for TopicMonitor object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
